name: API Docs
postCreateCommand: npm install -g seam-cli && seam config set fake-server && cd /workspaces/api-docs/snippet-playground/javascript && npm i seam@latest && cd /workspaces/api-docs/snippet-playground/csharp && ./init.sh && cd /workspaces/api-docs/snippet-playground/go && ./init.sh && cd /workspaces/api-docs/snippet-playground/php && composer update
